name: TERROID (itch)
description:
TERROID

You must protect Earth from the incoming asteroids!

Use your gun and shield together to prevent the asteroids from hitting Earth.

Controls:

Use your mouse or the left and right arrow keys to rotate your gun and shield.

Use left click or spacebar to fire your gun and destroy asteroids for points.

LudumDare 46 game link:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/terroid

Make sure to give it a rating!
